jdbcService.sql: update component_tag_group set db_modified_utc = timezone ('UTC', current_timestamp), min_occurs = case when :minOccurs is null then min_occurs else :minOccurs end, max_occurs = case when :maxOccurs is null then max_occurs else :maxOccurs end, component_id = case when :componentId is null then component_id else :componentId end, tag_group_id = case when :tagGroupId is null then tag_group_id else :tagGroupId end, default_tag_id = case when :defaultTagId is null then default_tag_id else :defaultTagId end where id = :id
